channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 深夜节目主持人吉米-法伦（Jimmy Fallon）一直在等待谈论他的护肤程序。"从来没有人问过我，"他说。"我一直在求别人问我"
item.description:
Late-night host Jimmy Fallon has been waiting to talk about his skin care routine. “No one’s ever asked me,” he said. “I’ve been begging for someone to.” https://t.co/YcoSrV3n6d https://t.co/YcoSrV3n6d

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 股市比多年来更加平静。有人担心是一种流行策略导致了这种平静。
item.description:
The stock market is calmer than it has been in years. Some worry that a popular strategy is contributing to the tranquility. https://t.co/WwY7I7f9xh https://t.co/WwY7I7f9xh

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 破产的加密货币交易所 FTX 已与二十多位买家达成 8.84 亿美元的交易，出售其在人工智能初创公司 Anthropic 的大部分股份。
item.description:
Bankrupt cryptocurrency exchange FTX has struck $884 million in deals with two dozen buyers to sell most of its shares in AI startup Anthropic https://t.co/SUw8QsMRBN https://t.co/SUw8QsMRBN

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 说唱歌手兼企业家肖恩-"迪迪"-康姆斯（Sean "Diddy" Combs）在洛杉矶的一处住宅遭到联邦特工突袭，原因是调查可能存在的人口贩运活动。
item.description:
A Los Angeles house connected to rapper and entrepreneur Sean "Diddy" Combs was raided by federal agents in connection with an investigation into possible human trafficking https://t.co/f2muKXwIHm https://t.co/f2muKXwIHm

item.description:

item.title: 大谷翔平（Shohei Ohtani）首次就赌博丑闻发表讲话，该丑闻将他的长期翻译与一名正在接受联邦调查的非法庄家联系在一起。
item.description:
Shohei Ohtani spoke for the first time to address the fallout from a betting scandal that linked his longtime interpreter to an illegal bookmaker who is under federal investigation https://t.co/y0ZP7NFoiv https://t.co/y0ZP7NFoiv

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 迈阿密的设计区已成为世界上最受欢迎的奢侈品中心之一，而纽约和芝加哥的类似街区近年来人流量却在下降
item.description:
Miami’s Design District has emerged as one of the world’s most popular luxury hubs as similar corridors in New York and Chicago have seen foot traffic drop in recent years https://t.co/Dm0xy2HB0R https://t.co/Dm0xy2HB0R

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 最新消息WeWork 联合创始人亚当-诺伊曼提出以超过 5 亿美元的价格回购这家破产的联合办公公司
item.description:
Breaking: WeWork co-founder Adam Neumann submitted an offer to buy back the bankrupt co-working company for more than $500 million https://t.co/yqAkk6o2cE https://t.co/yqAkk6o2cE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 一位是好莱坞选秀天才，另一位则是痴迷于数据的技术人员。Netflix 的两位联席首席执行官毫无相似之处，但在他们的带领下，这家流媒体公司卷土重来。
item.description:
One is a Hollywood talent whisperer, while the other is a data-obsessed techie. Netflix's co-CEOs are nothing alike, but on their watch the streamer has made a comeback. https://t.co/nPNye6clkF https://t.co/nPNye6clkF

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 你的 401（k）能为你的退休生活带来什么？四位单身女性公开自己的财务状况。

item.title: "要么你结束这一切，要么我走人"在华盛顿特区的一个富人区，一桩少棒丑闻让位高权重的家长们相互对立，并引发了一场大发现。
item.description:
“Either you end this crap, or I’m walking.” A Little League scandal in a wealthy part of Washington, D.C., pits high-powered parents against one another—and leads to a discovery. https://t.co/8fv210Umec https://t.co/8fv210Umec

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 他曾是一名律师，生活在美国梦中。后来，精神疾病让他的聪明才智与自己背道而驰。"他的姐姐说："我们以为他会得到他需要的帮助。相反，他失去了一切。
item.description:
He was a lawyer living the American dream. Then mental illness turned his brilliant mind against him. “We thought he was going to get the help he needed,” his sister said. Instead, he lost it all. https://t.co/KkpnszE3H2 https://t.co/KkpnszE3H2

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 电视传奇人物鲍勃-巴克（Bob Barker）长期居住的好莱坞住宅即将上市，售价为 298.8 万美元。巴克在这所约 5000 平方英尺的房子里居住了 50 多年。
item.description:
The longtime Hollywood home of TV legend Bob Barker is coming on the market for $2.988 million. Barker lived in the roughly 5,000-square-foot house for more than 50 years. https://t.co/8A1E07MCq1 https://t.co/8A1E07MCq1

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 它看起来就像一个标准的纽约市停车场。但自 2024 年初以来，这座位于曼哈顿西村的建筑已经签订了超过 1 亿美元的交易。
item.description:
It looks like your standard New York City parking garage. But since the beginning of 2024, more than $100 million in deals have been inked at the building in Manhattan's West Village. https://t.co/qp5puHzDfT https://t.co/qp5puHzDfT

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯领导人普京将周五音乐厅袭击事件的后果重新用作他对乌克兰战争的弹药，公众呼吁恢复对肇事者的死刑判决。
item.description:
Russian leader Putin is repurposing the aftermath of Friday’s concert-hall attack as ammunition for his war against Ukraine, amid public calls for reviving the death penalty for the perpetrators https://t.co/a1Kwp1ikSf https://t.co/a1Kwp1ikSf

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）取缔了一种名为 "臀部下压擒抱 "的技术，以提高球员的安全。但这些球员也反对这项禁令。
item.description:
The NFL has outlawed a technique called the hip-drop tackle in an effort to promote player safety. But those same players are against the ban. https://t.co/U92GZqkIOq https://t.co/U92GZqkIOq

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 高通公司表示已终止对 Autotalks 的拟议收购，理由是缺乏及时的监管批准

item.title: 中国电池制造冠军 CATL 的董事长表示，该公司正在与特斯拉和其他汽车制造商洽谈在美国许可其电池技术的事宜。
item.description:
The chairman of China’s battery-making champion CATL said the company is in talks with Tesla and other automakers to license its battery technology in the U.S. https://t.co/5HgNgMhz2t https://t.co/5HgNgMhz2t

item.title: 要想知道哪位候选人将赢得总统大选，请使用政治分析家杰夫-格林菲尔德的预测模型：竞选中的兔八哥总能打败达菲鸭
item.description:
To figure out which candidate will win the presidential election, use political analyst Jeff Greenfield’s prediction model: The Bugs Bunny of the race always beats the Daffy Duck https://t.co/JlO3QdcUe7 https://t.co/JlO3QdcUe7

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 印度的 TikTok 粉丝仍在质疑政府 2020 年禁止该社交媒体应用程序的决定。它提供了一个案例研究，TikTok 在美国也面临着类似的威胁。
item.description:
TikTok fans in India still question the government’s 2020 decision to ban the social-media app. It offers a case study, with TikTok facing a similar threat in the U.S. https://t.co/lWSmvGXrU1 https://t.co/lWSmvGXrU1

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024
